mapper.update:
update SYS_ROBOT_BELARC_ADVISOR
ROBOT_ID = #{robotId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MASTER_CONTROL_MODEL = #{masterControlModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_VERSION = #{masterControlFirmwareVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER_CONTROL_ID = #{masterControlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAD_VERSION = #{padVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAD_FIRMWARE_VERSION = #{padFirmwareVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAD_MANUFACTOR = #{padManufactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEID = #{meid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRIVE_MODEL = #{driveModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRIVE_FIRMWARE_VERSION = #{driveFirmwareVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRIVER_MANUFACTURER = #{driverManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRIVE_ID = #{driveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOTOR_MODEL = #{motorModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOTOR_ID = #{motorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOTOR_MANUFACTURER = #{motorManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATTERY_MODEL = #{batteryModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATTERY_MANUFACTURER = #{batteryManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATTERY_ID = #{batteryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROBOT_POWER = #{robotPower,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGER_MODEL = #{chargerModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGER_MANUFACTURER = #{chargerManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGER_ID = #{chargerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANGING_MODULAR_MODEL = #{rangingModularModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANGING_MODULAR_VERSION = #{rangingModularVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANGING_MODULAR_MANUFACTURER = #{rangingModularManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANGING_MODULAR_ID = #{rangingModularId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ROBOT_BELARC_ADVISOR_ID = #{robotBelarcAdvisorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_ROBOT_BELARC_ADVISOR set ROBOT_ID = #{robotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MASTER_CONTROL_MODEL = #{masterControlModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MASTER_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_VERSION = #{masterControlFirmwareVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MASTER_CONTROL_ID = #{masterControlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAD_VERSION = #{padVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAD_FIRMWARE_VERSION = #{padFirmwareVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAD_MANUFACTOR = #{padManufactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEID = #{meid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRIVE_MODEL = #{driveModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRIVE_FIRMWARE_VERSION = #{driveFirmwareVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRIVER_MANUFACTURER = #{driverManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRIVE_ID = #{driveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOTOR_MODEL = #{motorModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOTOR_ID = #{motorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOTOR_MANUFACTURER = #{motorManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATTERY_MODEL = #{batteryModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATTERY_MANUFACTURER = #{batteryManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATTERY_ID = #{batteryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROBOT_POWER = #{robotPower,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARGER_MODEL = #{chargerModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARGER_MANUFACTURER = #{chargerManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARGER_ID = #{chargerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANGING_MODULAR_MODEL = #{rangingModularModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANGING_MODULAR_VERSION = #{rangingModularVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANGING_MODULAR_MANUFACTURER = #{rangingModularManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANGING_MODULAR_ID = #{rangingModularId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ROBOT_BELARC_ADVISOR_ID = #{robotBelarcAdvisorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select UPGRADED_VERSION,UPDATE_DATE from SYS_ROBOT_SOFTWARE_VERSION where ROBOT_CODE = #{robotCode} and UPGRADE_MODULE=#{upgradeModule} ORDER BY UPDATE_DATE desc limit 1

SELECT A.ROBOT_BELARC_ADVISOR_ID, B.ROBOT_ID, A.MASTER_CONTROL_MODEL, A.MASTER_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_VERSION, A.MASTER_CONTROL_ID, A.PAD_VERSION, A.PAD_FIRMWARE_VERSION, A.PAD_MANUFACTOR, A.MEID, A.DRIVE_MODEL, A.DRIVE_FIRMWARE_VERSION, A.DRIVER_MANUFACTURER, A.DRIVE_ID, A.MOTOR_MODEL, A.MOTOR_ID, A.MOTOR_MANUFACTURER, A.BATTERY_MODEL, A.BATTERY_MANUFACTURER, A.BATTERY_ID, A.ROBOT_POWER, A.CHARGER_MODEL, A.CHARGER_MANUFACTURER, A.CHARGER_ID, A.RANGING_MODULAR_MODEL, A.RANGING_MODULAR_VERSION, A.RANGING_MODULAR_MANUFACTURER, A.RANGING_MODULAR_ID, A.CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATE_DATE FROM SYS_ROBOT_BELARC_ADVISOR A RIGHT JOIN SYS_ROBOT B ON A.ROBOT_ID = B.ROBOT_ID WHERE B.ROBOT_CODE = #{robotCode}

SELECT A.ROBOT_CODE AS robotCode, A.ROBOT_MODEL, A.ROBOT_ID, B.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME AS scenicSpotName, A.CLIENT_VERSION AS clientVersion, A.ROBOT_CODE_SIM AS robotCodeSim, C.ROBOT_BELARC_ADVISOR_ID, C.MASTER_CONTROL_MODEL, C.MASTER_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_VERSION, C.MASTER_CONTROL_ID, C.PAD_VERSION, C.PAD_FIRMWARE_VERSION, C.PAD_MANUFACTOR, C.MEID, C.DRIVE_MODEL, C.DRIVE_FIRMWARE_VERSION, C.DRIVER_MANUFACTURER, C.DRIVE_ID, C.MOTOR_MODEL, C.MOTOR_ID, C.MOTOR_MANUFACTURER, C.BATTERY_MODEL, C.BATTERY_MANUFACTURER, C.BATTERY_ID, C.ROBOT_POWER, C.CHARGER_MODEL, C.CHARGER_MANUFACTURER, C.CHARGER_ID, C.RANGING_MODULAR_MODEL, C.RANGING_MODULAR_VERSION, C.RANGING_MODULAR_MANUFACTURER, C.RANGING_MODULAR_ID, C.UPDATE_DATE FROM SYS_ROBOT_BELARC_ADVISOR C LEFT JOIN SYS_ROBOT A ON A.ROBOT_ID = C.ROBOT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT B ON A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = B.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
AND A.ROBOT_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{robotCode},'%')
ORDER BY A.ROBOT_CODE DESC

SELECT A.ROBOT_CODE AS robotCode, A.ROBOT_MODEL, A.ROBOT_ID, B.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME AS scenicSpotName, A.CLIENT_VERSION AS clientVersion, A.ROBOT_CODE_SIM AS robotCodeSim, C.ROBOT_BELARC_ADVISOR_ID, C.MASTER_CONTROL_MODEL, C.MASTER_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_VERSION, C.MASTER_CONTROL_ID, C.PAD_VERSION, C.PAD_FIRMWARE_VERSION, C.PAD_MANUFACTOR, C.MEID, C.DRIVE_MODEL, C.DRIVE_FIRMWARE_VERSION, C.DRIVER_MANUFACTURER, C.DRIVE_ID, C.MOTOR_MODEL, C.MOTOR_ID, C.MOTOR_MANUFACTURER, C.BATTERY_MODEL, C.BATTERY_MANUFACTURER, C.BATTERY_ID, C.ROBOT_POWER, C.CHARGER_MODEL, C.CHARGER_MANUFACTURER, C.CHARGER_ID, C.RANGING_MODULAR_MODEL, C.RANGING_MODULAR_VERSION, C.RANGING_MODULAR_MANUFACTURER, C.RANGING_MODULAR_ID, C.UPDATE_DATE FROM SYS_ROBOT A LEFT JOIN SYS_ROBOT_BELARC_ADVISOR C ON A.ROBOT_ID = C.ROBOT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT B ON A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = B.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
AND A.ROBOT_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{robotCode},'%')
